attributes.action: Hold a general election as soon as possible.
attributes.additional_details: In a democratic society, the legitimacy of Parliament depends upon the electorate voting for the key office-holders. That is what is lacking in the UK today. The only option is a new general election.
attributes.background: Given the recent changes to the Conservative Party leadership and hence the Prime Minister, Parliament should be dissolved immediately and a general election called.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
